item.title: Why I Started Using AI Seriously In 2026
item.description: I used AI for the better part of 2025 because I had to understand it for work.

item.title: Making a CMS
item.description: I was recently watching a video about vibecoding where they said that you really needed to use a model for a year before you got to the point where you could trust it.
